plays.text: Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Kris Draper AND Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Marek Zidlicky 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Crosschecking Kimmo Timonen
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan unassisted
Goal scored by Mathieu Schneider assisted by Henrik Zetterberg AND Mikael Samuelsson
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom AND Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Holding Paul Kariya
Goal scored by Mikael Samuelsson assisted by Henrik Zetterberg AND Johan Franzen
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Tripping Jordin Tootoo
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Jason Williams AND Niklas Kronwall
